title: e-Scarve System that can Provide Information by Using Contrast Technique
description: This is a project made to implement a contrast technique using Javascript programming langguage in PHP (laravel Framework) to give a better view for colour blind people and enhance their experience using the website.

title: Taman Pahlawan Reporting System
description: Develop a system to report a damage that happen at Taman Pahlawan. This system includes, Administrator, staffs and residents of Taman Pahlawan. The system use Java MVC (Model-View-Controller) framework.

title: Website Portfolio
description: Just a simple website portfolio. Have a look and enjoy ! :))
